lom:description.lom:string: Abstract: "This paper presents an interactive tutorial on queuing that uses Microsoft Excel as a platform. The unique features of this tutorial are related to a pedagogical plan that is appropriate for students of business. Implementation of the features in Excel is also discussed." Citation: Ashley D.W. (2002), "An Introduction to Queuing Theory in an Interactive Text Format," INFORMS Transactions on Education, Vol. 2, No. 3.

lom:title.lom:string: An Introduction to Queuing Theory in an Interactive Text Format
